trophies.trophyDetail: Prove yourself as the ultimate deceiver and gambler by earning all trophies in the game. You’re the undisputed master of this chaotic den of lies, poison, and high-stakes games.
Win for the first time in Deck Mode. You’ve taken your first step into the treacherous world of chance and deceit. Remember, in this pub, every victory is just another excuse for someone to lie.
Win for the first time in Dice Mode. Lady Luck has smiled on you, but don’t get too comfortable—dice can be as cruel as they are kind.
Drink a poison bottle for the first time. You knew it was risky, but curiosity got the better of you. Next time, maybe think twice before taking another sip.
Spot a lie for the first time in Deck Mode. Congratulations, your instincts are sharp enough to cut through the deception. In this pub, the ability to sniff out a liar is as valuable as a loaded gun.
Be the last one to die in Deck Mode. It’s not just about luck—you’ve dodged death until this moment, yet it eventually came for you.
Be the last one to die in Dice Mode. When the dice were loaded against you, you played the odds like a seasoned trickster and delayed your demise until the very end.
Get a King and a Queen in your hand while playing in Deck Mode. You’re not just lucky; you’re starting to look like royalty at the table. Too bad this pub has no crown.
Win 10 times in Deck Mode. This isn’t just luck anymore—you’ve mastered the fine art of gambling and bluffing under pressure.
Win 10 times in Dice Mode. Your skill with the dice has turned you into a living legend among the regulars of the pub.
Spot 50 lies in Deck Mode. Your ability to read people is almost supernatural. In this pub, this is the closest thing to a superpower.
Get three Kings in your hand while playing Deck Mode. A hand like that doesn’t come often—now use it wisely before someone spots it.
Win 50 times in Deck Mode. You’ve proven that you’re more than just a gambler—you’re the ruler of the deck table, feared and respected by all.
Win 50 times in Dice Mode. Your expertise with dice is unmatched. Even the pub’s most seasoned players refuse to sit across from you now.
Spot 100 lies in Deck Mode. Your keen eye and razor-sharp instincts make you the bane of liars everywhere. No one in the pub can pull the wool over your eyes anymore.
Get two Jokers in your hand while playing Deck Mode. This rare hand is both a blessing and a curse—just make sure it doesn’t get you killed.
Play 100 games of Deck Mode. As the revolver cylinder keeps spinning, and so does your thirst for the thrill of the gamble. You’re in too deep now.
Play 100 games of Dice Mode. The sound of rolling dice is music to your ears—win or lose, you can’t stop coming back for more.
Win a game of Deck Mode after taking 5 shots. Lady luck smiles upon you, but will she next time?
Die from the first revolver shot. You didn’t even have a chance to fight back—luck was not on your side this time. Better luck in the afterlife.
Die from the last revolver shot. You played with fire, and it burned you in the most dramatic way possible. At least you went out with a bang.
